bibl.author: John M. Binckley
bibl.title: John M. Binckley to B. F. Penniman, 4 February 1868
bibl.idno: Entry 10, Record Group 60, Letter Book G

revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: Care of Hatch, Estes & Co. p.o. Box 6155,
Your letter of the 3d, enclosing a copy of your letter of the same date to the Assistant District Attorney at Boston has been received by the Attorney General.
I herewith enclose a copy of our Instructions of this date to the United States District Attorney at Boston.
body.note: [For letter to the President, February 4, with Report & List of Justices of Peace, see p. 73.]
